meanings.definition: The end of the week, typically Saturday and Sunday, regarded as a time for leisure.
meanings.sent1: I love relaxing on weekends and watching movies.
meanings.sent2: Most people enjoy spending time with family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: On weekends, my cat thinks she's the boss and demands extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The weekends are like a mini-vacation from the hustle of the workweek.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pancakes on weekends always makes me happy.

meanings.definition: To spend the weekend at a particular place.
meanings.sent1: We weekends at the beach every summer.
meanings.sent2: She weekends at her grandparents' house in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The family weekends at the cabin by the lake to escape the city noise.
meanings.sent4: He weekends at the ski resort to practice his snowboarding skills.
meanings.sent5: They weekends at the music festival to enjoy live performances.
